data.title: ACC
data.text:
​Check out the upcoming events here!

Honor your loved one's military service on the

​"Pathway of Honor"

Information

​Order Form

See photos from the

​​Veteran's Memorial Dedication

Memorial Day, May 30, 2022

And check out our past events too!

The Acton Community Center is open for rental for your special events!!!

​Rental Coordinator: Sandy Madsen 661-269-2844

Forms and information available here

We have lots of information here about what we do and how we are able to do it. The Acton Community Club, Inc. sponsors and promotes many events throughout the year. Just check the menu above to find out how you can become a sponsor; how you can join a committee; how you can rent the hall for your special Anniversary or Birthday, Christening, Quinceañera, Bar or Bat Mitsvah or "Celebration of Life."

​And don't forget fundraising, luncheons, Bingo, Paint Nites, Spaghetti Dinners or dances, music events or dinner theater.

​

Check out our history too and take a look at our past events - we have made a lot of memories and had some fun along the way!

Have any ideas for an event you'd like to see??? Send us a note at [email protected]!
